quotes.quote: Suggestion is a literary strategy.
Self-suggestion makes you master of yourself.
If you do not act on a suggestion at first, you grow dull to its message.
I think a dream is just a suggestion to start something out, do something.
Do not pay too much attention to the advice or suggestions of those around you.
It is only too easy to make suggestions and later try to escape the consequences of what we say.
A fine suggestion, a sketch with great feeling, can be as expressive as the most finished product.
But when you're alone in the world, really alone, you have no choice but to be open to suggestions.
The trouble with making intelligent suggestions is that you're apt to be appointed to carry them out.
Close your ears to all adverse suggestions. Never mind if people call you a fool and a dreamer. Dream on.
We can make, to ourselves, very much stronger suggestions than anyone else can, whoever that person may be.
Once a suggestion has entered the general atmosphere of human thought, it is very difficult to neutralise it.
Sometimes when people give you suggestions they are kind of making you nervous, you wonder whether you are doing something wrong.
Be open to suggestions, but don't let anyone dictate how you should tell your story. Who can possibly tell your story better than you?
Advices, suggestions and opinions are good; better it would be to learn from them, then to follow them.
Reasoned arguments and suggestions which make allowance for the full difficulties of the state of war that exists may help, and will always be listened to with respect and sympathy.

The mere suggestion of fame and fortune casts a glamour all its own. It is rather alarming how quickly people will turn someone else's fiction into fact in order to support their own fictions of themselves.

The mere suggestion that not speaking for a day can give you an appreciation of the social isolation that comes with the experience of disability, particularly those whose impairments prohibit them from communicating verbally, is insensitive at best.
Unusual travel suggestions are dancing lessons from God.
A man carries out suggestions the more wholeheartedly when he understands their aim.
If you're going to knock down my suggestion, you'd better have one to replace it.
